title: Riot you need to revert the Mordekaiser rework
body:
I honestly don't care about mordekaiser, but it's incredibly unfair what you've done to their playerbase.

You can't rework a champion in a way no one wants, then nerf it into oblivion because what you've created is worse than the original design and then just sit there twiddling your thumbs hoping people forget about the whole thing.

It was a good experiment but I think it's time to accept that it's an experiment gone terribly wrong.
